q: "Late Show with David Letterman ," Green Bay Packers quarterback Aaron Rodgers talked a range of topics from his days in high school to the locker room mood at halftime of the Super Bowl. The song, We Are the Champions, greeted Aaron Rodgers as he walked onstage to a standing ovation. "There must be a lot of Wisconsin people out there," Aaron Rodgers said to wild applause. "It felt funny playing against guys you played with all year," Allen Iverson said. You look left, you look right and there are guys that were always right there in the foxhole with you, who felt bad when you felt bad. It was tough. Brandon Spikes Bond, owner of All or Nothing Tattoo on South Cobb Drive and All or Nothing pit bull rescue, said he and store manager Daron James are introducing the dogs to the world of human love. In August, Michael Vick pleaded guilty to a federal dog-fighting charge, admitting his involvement in a dog-fighting enterprise that killed poorly performing dogs by hanging or drowning. Bloomberg News reported Thursday that the bonuses would average$ 10,000 for the company's 10,755 salaried workers, but some who aren't covered by government pay restrictions could get up to half their salary. Details regarding salaried performance awards are considered confidential employment records, Ranieri said. Chrysler CEO Sergio Marchionne has said the workers deserve bonuses even though the company lost money because of work they did in revamping or redesigning 16 models since the 2009 bankruptcy.
